dcterms:description: A pedestrian-centric traffic video dataset for fine-grained spatial-temporal understanding, containing 155 scenarios and 810 videos from both fixed overhead cameras and vehicle cameras, with annotations capturing the location, attention, behaviour, and context information of both vehicles and pedestrians.
dcterms:title: WTS dataset

dcterms:description: A diverse driving dataset for heterogeneous multitask learning, providing 3402 vehicle camera videos extracted for use in traffic analysis.
dcterms:title: BDD100K dataset
